alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:59PM CDT until June 14 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR JACKSON...SOUTHWESTERN OUACHITA...SOUTH CENTRAL CLAIBORNE... NORTHEASTERN BIENVILLE...SOUTHERN LINCOLN AND NORTHEASTERN WINN PARISHES... At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arcadia, or 14 miles west of Grambling, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Jonesboro, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Arcadia, Gibsland, Choudrant, Simsboro, Chatham, Hodge, North Hodge, East Hodge, Athens, Bienville, Quitman, Eros, Sikes, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon and Brice. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Claiborne; Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Winn
